name: Market
description: Market. Implements the market. The market will be governed by an ERC20 token as currency, and an ERC1155 token that represents the ownership of the items being traded. Only ads for selling items are implemented. The item tokenization is responsibility of the ERC1155 contract which should encode any item details.

parameterDecorators.name: reporter
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the entity that reported the updater misbehavior.

functionDecorators.name: cancelTrade
functionDecorators.description: Cancels a trade by the poster.

functionDecorators.name: executeTrade
functionDecorators.description: Executes a trade. Must have approved this contract to transfer the amount of currency specified to the poster. Transfers ownership of the item to the filler.

parameterDecorators.name: _trade
parameterDecorators.description: The id of an existing trade.

functionDecorators.name: getTrade
functionDecorators.description: Returns the details for a trade.

functionDecorators.name: onERC1155BatchReceived
functionDecorators.description: Handles the receipt of a multiple ERC1155 token types. This function is called at the end of a `safeBatchTransferFrom` after the balances have been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155BatchReceived(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xbc197c81, or its own function selector).

parameterDecorators.name: operator
parameterDecorators.description: The address which initiated the batch transfer (i.e. msg.sender).

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: The address which previously owned the token.

parameterDecorators.name: ids
parameterDecorators.description: An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array).

parameterDecorators.name: values
parameterDecorators.description: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array).

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Additional data with no specified format.

functionDecorators.name: onERC1155Received
functionDecorators.description: Handles the receipt of a single ERC1155 token type. This function is called at the end of a `safeTransferFrom` after the balance has been updated. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1155Received(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)"))` (i.e. 0xf23a6e61, or its own function selector).

parameterDecorators.name: operator
parameterDecorators.description: The address which initiated the transfer (i.e. msg.sender).

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: The address which previously owned the token.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: The ID of the token being transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of tokens being transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: data
parameterDecorators.description: Additional data with no specified format.

functionDecorators.name: openTrade
functionDecorators.description: Opens a new trade. Puts _item in escrow.

parameterDecorators.name: _item
parameterDecorators.description: The id for the item to trade.

parameterDecorators.name: _price
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of currency for which to trade the item.

functionDecorators.name: supportsInterface
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if this contract implements the interface defined by `interfaceId`. See the corresponding https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-165#how-interfaces-are-identified[EIP section] to learn more about how these ids are created. This function call must use less than 30 000 gas.
